item.title: Ovation Diagnostics
item.description: Diagnosing opioid abuse using patient genotype and clinic information. Matthew Paff recently graduated from the University of Texas at Austin with a Ph.D.Â in Cell and Molecular Biology Background Opioid abuse is a serious public health crisis that has reached epidemic proportions over the past few years (figure 1). In 2016, there were over 42,249 opioid-related deaths in the United States, more than the number of Americans that die from breast cancer every year.
